statements.statement: SELECT ${companyCd} AS COMPANY_CD ,('MR'||NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(M.REQUEST_NO , 3, 7))) + 1,TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMM')) || '001')) AS REQUEST_NO , ${requestType} AS REQUEST_TYPE ,'' AS MATER_NM ,'' AS MATER_CD ,'' AS MATER_TYPE ,'' AS MATER_GROUP ,'' AS UNIT ,'01' AS STATUS ,'' AS CANCEL_MSG ,'' AS SAP_MSG FROM TB_MATER_REQUEST M WHERE M.COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND SUBSTR(M.REQUEST_NO , 3, 4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMM')
